options.ShowObjectOutlines.desc: Shows red outlines around objects (stones, forage, etc)
options.ShowMineableItems.desc: Shows item drops for mineable (stones etc) objects.
options.ShowArtifactSpotItems.desc: Shows item drops for artifact spots.
options.ShowFishInMinigame.desc: Shows what fish is being caught in the fising minigame.
options.ShowFishChances.desc: Shows fish chances when fishing rod is equiped.
options.ShowTrashChances.desc: Shows trash chances when fishing rod is equiped.
options.ShowSecretNoteChances.desc: Shows secret note chances when fishing rod is equiped.
